aircraft.value: Shadow Hunter - AC-1866-996 at Regional Depot-C

defect_observed.value: Wiring harness insulation breakdown. Abnormality observed during system test.

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Lighting System component. Analysis of operational data indicated parameter deviation.

corrective_action.value: Replace defective component with serviceable unit from approved stock

preventive_action.value: Reduce inspection interval for affected component type

remarks_investigation.value: Thorough investigation completed. Preventive actions recommended.

remarks_design.value: Design review completed. No design modification required. Component replacement as per maintenance manual is adequate. Date: 17/04/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Sqn Ldr A.R. Desai

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality assurance review completed. Recommend enhanced incoming inspection criteria for this component type. Date: 18/04/2023 Signature: Wg Cdr D.S. Nair

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Fleet experience reviewed. Similar occurrences noted on other platforms. Support fleet-wide inspection. Date: 21/04/2023 Signature: Wg Cdr M.S. Reddy

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Regulatory quality requirements verified. Proposed actions meet airworthiness standards. Recommend approval. Date: 23/04/2023 Signature: Wg Cdr M.S. Reddy

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) From regulatory standpoint, investigation meets required standards. Approve proposed corrective actions. Date: 26/04/2023 Signature: Dr. P.L. Mehta

Centre for Military Airworthiness and Certification
FORM - 44
DEFECT INVESTIGATION REPORT FORMAT
Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Mission Critical
b) Defect Observed: Wiring harness insulation breakdown. Abnormality observed during system test.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Electromagnetic interference affecting sensor accuracy
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Lighting System component. Analysis of
operational data indicated parameter deviation.
c) Remedial Measures Replace defective component with serviceable unit from approved stock
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Reduce inspection interval for affected component type
d) Attributable Code: N - Not established
